name: Prod Deals
description: Learn how to use monday CRM: https://youtu.be/QjKcGGVPLVE

columns.title: Contact(s)
columns.description: This column is connected to the Contacts board. You can choose an existing contact, or create a new contact here.

columns.title: Accounts
columns.description: This column is connected to the contact.

columns.title: Expected Close Date
columns.description: Set the expected close date and track your forecasted revenue in the Sales Dashboard.

columns.title: Close Probability
columns.description: Set how likely it is to close the deal. This will impact the Forecast Value column.

columns.title: Forecast Value
columns.description: The forecast value is reached by multiplying the deal value and close probability. The forecast value column is available with the Pro plan.

name: Activities
description:
The activities board shows all the activities that are added using the Emails & Activities in the page.
Every time you add an activity through Emails & Activities, a new activity will be added to this board.

columns.title: Cadence

name: Contacts
description: Welcome to your contacts board! Here you can store and manage all of your contacts

columns.title: Domain
columns.description: Enter a domain to auto-enrich columns with data from Crunchbase. Enjoy 1000 free enrichments. Unlock more in the Crunchbase app.

columns.title: Contacts
columns.description: This column is connected to the Contacts board. Connect as many contacts as needed to the account.

columns.title: Deals
columns.description: This column presents all the deals associated with the account.

name: Client Projects
description:
The essence of this board is to provide a high-level overview of your project. This is the place to plan and track your progress. 
For more information and a full explanation of how to use this template check out this video:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug5TyvMd-3Y&feature=youtu.be

columns.title: Owner
columns.description: The activity owner

columns.title: Timeline
columns.description: The column shows a timeframe for  each activity. You can see a summary of these activities at the bottom of each group.
